author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alcoa Corporation Announces Pricing Of Debt Offering
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Alcoa Corp:
* ALCOA CORPORATION ANNOUNCES PRICING OF DEBT OFFERING * ALCOA CORP - CO’S UNIT HAS PRICED AN OFFERING OF $500 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 6.125% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2028 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
